content: the slipover is knitted from the bottom up the body is worked in the round on a circular needle starting with a twisted rib hem followed by stockinette and two-colour pattern according to the chart up to the armhole after dividing at the armhole the back and front are worked separately up to the shoulders which are joined together with a 3-needle bind off next stitches are picked up along the armholes and neckline all edges are worked in twisted rib and folded to the wrong side where they are sewn down using a whipstitch
